Described Disease.Described Disease: Alzheimer's disease and Major Depressive Disorder

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression levels were significantly altered for the variant NM_001126112.3:c.60G>A.
Protein expression levels were significantly altered for the variant NM_001126112.3:c.310C>T.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-tests and ANOVA were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels within the range of 80-120% of baseline.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels deviating by more than 20% from baseline.
